tha-ap520:0.3_0: As he was leaving this, so he had to prepare more senior monks.
tha-ap520:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
tha-ap520:3.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
tha-ap520:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap520:4.4_0: they wished for the perception of their own fruit.
tha-ap520:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap520:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap520:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jhoṭiya.
tha-ap520:9.1_0: The eighth section for recitation on the senior monks
